[Brilliant](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1043)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 180 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This rune causes a weapon to transform into pure, brilliant energy. The weapon deals an additional 1d4 fire damage on a successful Strike, as well as 1d4 good damage to [fiends](/Traits.aspx?ID=70) and 1d4 positive damage to [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160). On a critical hit, the target must succeed at a DC 29 Fortitude save or be [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) for 1 round.
